Title: Privilege Escalation
Description: It has been discovered that TYPO3 Neos is vulnerable to Privilege Escalation. Logged in editors could access, create and modify content nodes that exist in the workspace of other editors.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.1.0-beta1 before 1.1.3, all versions starting from 1.2.0-beta1 before 1.2.3
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.1.0-beta1, all versions starting from 1.1.3 before 1.2.0-beta1, all versions starting from 1.2.3
